definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="file" type="File">file</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">notread.txt</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"/></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/filechecker/</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="file_exists"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:file</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:file</field></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
